ygData.subject: Re: Dusty Bloodstained Gloves
ygData.msgSnippet: You have heard correct.  +25 mana and 2 AC.  They can be found in UNrest...but High level loot.  They can be bought there for the low price of 50pp (minimum).
ygData.messageBody:
You have heard correct. +25 mana and 2 AC. They can be found in
UNrest...but High level loot. They can be bought there for the low
price of 50pp (minimum). I got mine for 50pp. I love em. Makes me
feel better since I only have 120 intel knowing there are items which
will up my mana and intel.

- Ziffnab of Xegony

--- Bryan Pray <bryan@...> wrote:
> From: Bryan Pray <bryan@...>
>
> Anyone where the Dusty Bloodstained Gloves can be
> found or bought, I have
> heard they are a plus 25 to mana.
